meta.@content: Autogenerated version of TransDCE.x3d scene produced from TransDCE.xml Chemical Markup Language (CML) source file.
Originally Published in Proceedings of Web3D 2003, ACM Press
An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding
